alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 1:55AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pierce, southwestern Brantley and east central Ware Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 155 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Braganza, or 7 miles southeast of Waycross, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Braganza, Boggy Bay and Fort Mudge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
